short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension wallet from Decentralized Authority.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NodeWallet is an open source, browser-based POKT wallet built by Decentralized Authority, the team behind Node Pilot. It is one of the most secure and user-friendly ways to interact with the Pocket Network ecosystem.

NodeWallet features:

* Universal Seed Phrase Importer (Import seed phrases from other popular wallets, so you donâ€™t need a POKT specific seed phrase for POKT addresses)
* Key file and private key importer
* Generate endless POKT addresses from one seed
* Manage multiple seed wallets
* wPOKT Bridge compatible
* Open source with plugin design to make it contributor friendly for adding features and expanding to other networks
* Utilizes argon2 + AES-256 GCM for quantum secure encryption

Jump into the POKT ecosystem today with NodeWallet!
